page.title: 10EDUCATION - primary school
page.content: It is situated on the Sway rd and caters for 221 pupils between the ages of 5 and 11. There are 8 teachers and 2 helpers. The seven classes all have a separate room of which four are contained in the 100 year old main building and the remainder in external separate huts which also include individual dining and assembly rooms. The huts are scheduled for demolition when the main building is extended. The day begins at 8.45am with breaks at 10.30am and 2.15pm for 20 minutes and for 1 hour at mid-day for lunch. Schools closes at 3.40pm. Mathematics and English are the main features of study supported by history, environmental studies,religious studies and some computer familiar- isation.
